Package com.github.protobufel.crud.el

Provides basic query processing capabilities using EL 3.0 expression language with a mix of regular objects and ProtoBuf Messages and Builders.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QueryProcessors.IQueryProcessor<E>
    Defines a basic query processor.
    QueryProcessors.ISearchable<E>
    Defines a basic search capability.
    QueryProcessors.QueryResultListener
    An EventListener reporting each single result.
    QueryProcessors.ValidationListener
    A validation EventListener.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ProtoMessageQueryProcessor
    Processes queries, lists of objects, using the EL 3.0 language, including validation and error reporting.
    ProtoMessageQueryProcessor.DefaultValidationListener  
    ProtoMessageQueryProcessor.QueryBuilder
    A query builder and EL 3.0 Language processor with ProtoBuf.
    QueryProcessors
    Query Processor Interfaces.

Package com.github.protobufel.crud.el Description

Provides basic query processing capabilities using EL 3.0 expression language with a mix of regular objects and ProtoBuf Messages and Builders.

Usage

: Get a list of ProtoBuf Message(s) as an in-parameter, with an optional map of beans, and as the result return a list of ProtoBuf Message(s), processed via EL 3.0 language. This, effectively, can be any CRUD operation, or a combination of thereof. 
 List actual = ProtoMessageQueryProcessor.builder()
     .setExpression("(index==0) ? (record.color='RED') : null; record")
     .process(originalCityList);
Author:
protobufel@gmail.com David Tesler
See Also:
Examples.java, galaxy.proto sample, JSR-000341 Expression Language 3.0, Protocol Buffers
